summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2718, for the improvement of Ellis Avenue from Myrtle Street O Bailey Street, all in the City of Seattle, by grading the same and constructing the necessary curbs and gutters, together with such sewers and water mains with their appurtenances as may be necessary for the proper sewerage, drainage, water service and fire protection of said district, and including the planking as may be necessary.
